name: RVA Beer Lovers (Charcoal)
description:
RVA is for beer lovers!
We have some great breweries right here in Richmond.  Show your support and pride for living in a great city with great beer!  

Features: 
-100% preshrunk heavyweight cotton 
-Shoulder to shoulder tape and seamless collarette 
-Seamless collar 
-Double needle stitching neck, sleeve and bottom hem.

name: RVA Horns Hoodie (Black)
description:
RVA Horns Hoodie (Black)

-8.0 oz., 50/50 cotton/polyester
-Pill-resistant and softer air-jet spun yarn
-Double-lined hood with matching drawstring 
-1x1 athletic rib kint cuffs and waistband with spandex
-Double-needle stitching throughout
-Front pouch pocket
